comments.author: Christel Waves

comments.text:
Try this, if you happened to have a fluorescent light bulb and a plasma 
ball.

Stand on a chair, hold the fluorescent light bulb by the metal bit on one 
hand and put your other hand on the plasma ball for a good 10 seconds. Now 
with your charged hands, touch the fluorescent light bulb and witness the 
power of the super saiyan. ﻿
